                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="width: 3.568em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.912em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1002.87em, 2.174em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm\vec{A}=-\vec{B} </script></span>&nbsp;অর্থাৎ তাদের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="width: 2.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.48em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-64"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">180</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-66"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-67"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-68" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>180</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">180°</script></span></p>

<p>অর্থাৎ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B7;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="width: 11.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.018em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1008.98em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-70"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-71"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-72"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-73"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-78"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-79"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">180</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-89"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-90"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-92"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-93"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">η</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>180</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>η</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm \vec{A}\times\vec{B}=ABsin180°η=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="width: 1.642em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-137"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-139"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-140"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-141"><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0</p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="width: 11.314em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-166" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-181"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-182"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-183"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm \hat{j}\times\left(\hat{j}\times\hat{k}\right)=\hat{j}\times\hat{i}=-\hat{k} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্রোতহীন নদীতে কোনো নৌকার বেগ 2x । x&nbsp;বেগের স্রোতের কোন নদীতে নৌকাটি সর্বনিম্ন পথে নদী পার হলে লব্ধি বেগ কত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="width: 19.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.781em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1015.53em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-199"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">v</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-216"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-217" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-220" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-225" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-228"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm u+vcos\alpha=0\Rightarrow cos\alpha=-\frac{x}{2x}\therefore cos\alpha=-\frac{1}{2}\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>w</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2.</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>.2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-232" style="width: 14.182em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-260" style="width: 15.125em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 4.018em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; left: 5.084em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.117em, 1001.48em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-280"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-282"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.781em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.096em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-287"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm =\sqrt{x^2+4x^2-2x^2}=\sqrt{3x^2}=\sqrt3x</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুইটি ভেক্টরের বৃহত্তম এবং ক্ষুদ্রতম লব্ধি যথাক্রমে 17&nbsp;এবং 7 একক হলে এবং ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-290" style="width: 1.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.492em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.34em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-291"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-293"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-294"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">60°</script></span> কোণে ক্রিয়া করলে লব্ধি কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 4.346em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1003.57em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -2.457em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.801em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-332"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-333"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">24</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.838em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><munder><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>P</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>P</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>_</mo></munder></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm \begin{matrix}\underline{\begin{matrix}P+Q=17\\\ \ P-Q=7\ \ \\\end{matrix}}\\2P=24\\\end{matrix}</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="width: 7.297em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-339"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                             <span>Question 6 </span>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-400"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-401"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.523em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.246em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm \vec{A}=2\hat{i}+3\hat{j}+\hat{k}</script></span>&nbsp;ভেক্টরটির x&nbsp;অক্ষের সাথে উৎপন্ন কোণ-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.005em; left: -0.089em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.005em; left: 0.503em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.735em, 1001em, 4.784em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.831em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msqrt><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>14</mn></mfrac></msqrt></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm \sin^{-1}{\sqrt{\frac{4}{14}}} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msqrt><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>14</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="width: 10.535em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>14</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msqrt><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>14</mn></mfrac></msqrt></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msqrt><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></msqrt></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="width: 18.609em; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.82em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.875em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>14</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msqrt><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>14</mn></mfrac></msqrt></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msqrt><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></msqrt></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm \therefore\alpha=\cos^{-1}{\frac{2}{\sqrt{14}}}=\sin^{-1}{\sqrt{\frac{10}{14}}}=\sin^{-1}{\sqrt{\frac{5}{7}}}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.246em; left: 0.151em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">\rm \vec{B}</script></span>&nbsp;ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-619" style="width: 15.125em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm \left|\vec{C}\right|^2=\left|\vec{A}\right|^2+\left|\vec{B}\right|^2+2\left|\vec{A}\right|\ \left|\vec{B}\right|\ cos\alpha</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="width: 13.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1011.39em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-678"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="width: 9.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1007.5em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-703"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-714" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm \Rightarrow cos\alpha=0\therefore\alpha=\frac{\pi}{2}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="width: 9.167em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span id="MathJax-Span-884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-886"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-887"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm \vec{A}.\vec{B}=ABcos\theta\Rightarrow cos\theta=\frac{\vec{A}.\vec{B}}{AB}=\frac{3\times2+3\times1-3\times3}{AB}=\frac{0}{AB}\Rightarrow cos\theta=0\therefore\theta=90°  </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>13</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-889" style="width: 7.304em;                                         <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>13</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>13</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>26</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="width: 14.879em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">26</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>13</mn><mi>γ</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>13</mn><mi>γ</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>26</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">\rm \frac{3}{6}=\frac{5}{10}=\frac{13}{\gamma}\Rightarrow\frac{3}{6}=\frac{13}{\gamma}\Rightarrow\gamma=26 </script></span></p>
</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-961" style="width: 6.224em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.106em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.157em, 1005.11em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-962"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-963"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-964"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-965"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.561em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.022em; left: 0.076em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.259em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">3</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-970"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-971"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-972"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.26em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.114em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">5</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-977"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-978"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-979"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.246em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm \vec{p}=3\hat{i}+5\hat{k} </script></span>&nbsp;ভেক্টরের উপর লম্ব ভেক্টর নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mn>.9</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>.9</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="width: 10.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1008.89em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1023"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1024"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1025"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1026"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1038"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1040"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1041"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1042"><span style="display: inline-block;
