position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">.9</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1055"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1056"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.21em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">j</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mn>.9</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>.9</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm \vec{p}.9\hat{j}=\left(3\hat{i}+5\hat{k}\right).9\hat{j}=0 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1062"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;স্কেলার গুণন = 0&nbsp;; ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব।&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>13</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="width: 2.416em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.816em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm \left|\vec{A}\times\vec{B}\right|^2+\left(\vec{A}.\vec{B}\right)^2=? </script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1003.94em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1229"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1231"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">\rm \left|\vec{A}\times\vec{B}\right|^2+\left(\vec{A}.\vec{B}\right)^2=\left(ABsin\theta\right)^2+\left(ABcos\theta\right)^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="width: 14.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1011.52em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1241"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1246"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1250" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1251"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1252"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1263"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1265"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1272"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm =A^2B^2\left(\cos^2{\theta}+\sin^2{\theta}\right)=A^2B^2</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.558em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">\rm \left(3\right)\ \hat{i} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1424"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1425"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1426"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm \vec{v}=\frac{d\vec{r}}{dt}=\frac{d}{dt}\left[\left\{3t+4\right\}\hat{j}+5\ \hat{j}\right]=\left(3\right)\ \hat{i} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 16 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন গ্রুপের মৌলসমূহকে ‘হ্যালোজেন’ বলা হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্রুপ-13</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>গ্রুপ-17&nbsp;কে হ্যালোজেন বা সামুদ্রিক লবণ উৎপন্নকারী মৌল বলা হয়।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>প্রদত্ত পারমাণবিক সংখ্যাবিশিষ্ট মৌলসমূহের মধ্যে কোনটির ইলেকট্রন আসক্তি বেশি?</p>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>17</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>35</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>53</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ফ্লোরিনের (9) আকার ছোট তাই ইলেকট্রন ঘনত্ব বেশি। বাহির হতে আগত ইলেকট্রনকে বিকর্ষণ করে এবং ক্লোরিন (17) অপেক্ষা কমশক্তি নির্গত করে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি শিখা পরীক্ষায় বর্ণ প্রদর্শন করে না?&nbsp;</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Both a &amp; c</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Be&nbsp;ও Mg&nbsp;এর আকার ছোট হওয়ায় সর্বশেষ শক্তিস্তরে প্রবল আকর্ষণ থাকে তাই তাপে ইলেকট্রনসমূহ উচ্চশক্তি স্তরে গমন করতে পারে না। তাই বর্ণ প্রদর্শন করে না।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row">

                                            <span>Question 27 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পর্যায় সারণিতে একই গ্রুপের ওপর থেকে নিচে কোন পর্যায়বৃত্ত ধর্মটি বৃদ্ধি পায়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1599" style="width: 6.149em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.032em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.96em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1600"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1601"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1603" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1604" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1605" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\rm x^2-2y=1</script></span>&nbsp;এর পোলার রূপ কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="width: 8.29em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.787em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1006.7em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1610"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1612" style="padding-left: 0.184em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1614"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1616"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1617" style="padding-left: 0.184em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1618"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1619" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="width: 15.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.912em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1012.91em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1669"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1671" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1673" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1680" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1682" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1686" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1689"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1691"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\rm \Rightarrow x^2=1+2y\Rightarrow x^2+y^2=\left(y+1\right)^2 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="width: 15.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1012.54em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1698"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1714"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1718"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1719" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1720"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1723" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-106">\rm \Rightarrow r=rsin\ \theta+1\Rightarrow r\left(1-\sin{\theta}\right)=1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 33 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1842" style="width: 3.02em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1852" style="width: 23.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.223em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1019.18em, 2.83em, -999.998em); position: relative; width: 9.059em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.953em, 1008.03em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1856"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1857"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.953em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1865" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1867" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 6.273em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 6.805em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.137em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1885" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115">\rm \Rightarrow\sqrt{\left(2-2\right)^2+\left(y-6\right)^2}=1\Rightarrow y-6=\pm1 \therefore y=7,\ 5 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1958" style="width: 4.556em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.736em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1003.64em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1959"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1960"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1961" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1962"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\left(5,\ -1\right) </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1969" style="width: 23.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.018em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1018.94em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1970"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1972" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1974"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1975"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1976"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1981" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.38em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.379em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.22em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1985"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1987" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1989" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1994" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1995" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1996"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2004" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2006"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2010" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2013" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2015"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\rm \Rightarrow\left(\frac{5+7+\alpha}{3},\frac{6-8+\beta}{3}\right)=\left(3,\ -1\right) 
\Rightarrow\left(\alpha,\ \beta\right)=\left(-3,\ -1\right) </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>y-অক্ষ&nbsp;বিভক্ত করে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="width: 5.002em; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 37 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2138" style="width: 16.768em; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2152" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2154"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2164" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2166"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2170" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2173" style="width: 1.529em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-139-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1009.35em, 5.494em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2213"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2214"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2215" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2216" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2217"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2218" style="vertical-align: 2.174em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtable" id="MathJax-Span-2219" style="padding-right: 0.166em; padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.043em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.42em, 1001.19em, 5.986em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>12</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2259" style="width: 17.748em; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2291" style="width: 15.207em; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>∴</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-141">\rm \Rightarrow-6x-5y+9=9\therefore6x+5y=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 38 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>y-অক্ষ থেকে কোনো বিন্দুর দূরত্ব মূলবিন্দু থেকে তার দূরত্বের অর্ধেক। বিন্দুটির সঞ্চারপথের সমীকরণ কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

padding-left: 0.23em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2319"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.959em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.463em, 1000.5em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2321" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-142">\rm x^2-3y^2=0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
