                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, বিন্দুটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-146-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2358" style="width: 10.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1008.89em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2359"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2360"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2362"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2371" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2374"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.141em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.117em, 1003.12em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2375"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2376"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2378" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2380" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2382" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1003.12em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.629em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 2.42em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.412em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.904em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.436em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.928em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-146">\rm \left(x,\ y\right)\Rightarrow x=\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{x^2+y^2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-147-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2383" style="width: 14.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1011.6em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2384"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2387"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2389" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2391" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2393" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2395" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2397" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2399" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2401" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2404"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2406" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-147">\rm \Rightarrow4x^2=x^2+y^2\Rightarrow y^2-3x^2=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2453" style="width: 13.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.74em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1010.74em, 3.568em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2465" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2466" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2467"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2468"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2469" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2470" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2474" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2481" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-154">\rm \left(\frac{-3p}{2}\right)\times\left(\frac{-4}{-1}\right)=-1\therefore p=\frac{1}{6} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 40 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2484" style="width: 6.224em;                                 </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>নির্ণেয় রেখা:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-161-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6.4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2536" style="width: 10.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1008.4em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2537"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6.</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2546" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2548"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2550" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6.4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6.4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-161">\rm 6x+6y=6.\ \left(-2\right)+6.4</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-162-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2554" style="width: 12.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.289em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1010.25em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2555"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-162">\rm \Rightarrow 6x+6y=12\Rightarrow x+y=2</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 41 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>A বিন্দুটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-163-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2570" style="width: 7.751em;                                                 <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>14</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2633" style="width: 3.691em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.008em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.92em, 2.598em, -999.998em); </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>36</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2684" style="width: 26.477em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-171-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>48</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2722" style="width: 19.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.699em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1015.62em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2723"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">16</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">48</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2743" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>48</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-171">\rm \Rightarrow8x-16y=48\Rightarrow x-2y-6=0\cdots\cdots\left(i\right)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-172-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2747" style="width: 10.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1008.49em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2748"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2757" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2759" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2761"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-172">\rm x-3y-2=0\cdots\cdots\left(ii\right)</script></span></p>

<p>(i) ও (ii) সমাধান করে পাই,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>14</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2765" style="width: 6.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1005.53em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2766"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2767"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2769"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2821" style="width: 15.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1012.91em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2822"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2823"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.19em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2824"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2825" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2834" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2835"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2836" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2837" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2838" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.76em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2839"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2840" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2841" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2842" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2843" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2845" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2846" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.8em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2847"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2848" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2849" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2851" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.97em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2855" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-177">\rm \frac{4-1}{-1-x}=\frac{4+2}{-1-5}\Rightarrow\frac{3}{-1-x}=-1\therefore x=2 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 43 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2859" style="width: 3.02em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2860"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2861"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2863"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ঢাল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-184-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>135</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2904" style="width: 13.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.74em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2905"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2907"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2908" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2909"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2910" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2912" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2913"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2914" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2915" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2916" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.76em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2917"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2918" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2919" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2920" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2921" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2922" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2923" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2925" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2926" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2927" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">135</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2929"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2930"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2931" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>135</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-184">\rm \tan{\theta}=\frac{6-1}{-4-1}=-1\therefore\theta=135°</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2932" style="width: 7.118em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-191-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2992" style="width: 3.827em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-192-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3005" style="width: 5.617em; <p>তাহলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3045" style="width: 7.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1006.27em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3046"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3047"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1001.56em, 4.141em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3060" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3061" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3062"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3063" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.6em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>α</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>α</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-194">\rm \frac{p}{\cos{\alpha}}=\frac{p}{\sin{\alpha}}=-1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-195-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3067" style="width: 10.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1008.61em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3068"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3069" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3071"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3072" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3073"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3074" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3075" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3076" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3080" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3081" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3082" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3084" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-195">\rm \therefore\cos{\alpha}=-p\cdots\cdots\left(i\right)\ ;\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-196-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3087" style="width: 8.895em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3088"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3090"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3091" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3092"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3093" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3098" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3099" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3101"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-197-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3105" style="width: 15.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1012.42em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3106"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3107"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3108" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">{</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3109"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3110"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 1.068em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3115" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3117" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3124" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3125" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">}</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3130"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3133" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3136" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3137" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3138"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3139"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3140" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-197">\rm \left\{\left(i\right)^2+\left(ii\right)^2\right\}\Rightarrow1=2p^2\therefore p=\frac{1}{\sqrt2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-198-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00F7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3141" style="width: 10.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1008.32em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3142"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3143"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">{</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3145"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3146"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3148"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">÷</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3153" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">}</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3160"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3161" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3162"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3163" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3164" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>÷</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-198">\rm \left\{\left(ii\right)\div\left(i\right)\right\}\Rightarrow\tan{\alpha=1}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-199-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3166" style="width: 7.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.74em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.74em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3167"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3168" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3172" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3177"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3178" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3179" style="font-size: 70.7%; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 45 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em);
