width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-602"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-603"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-604" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>γ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm \Rightarrow\sin^2{\gamma}=\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{4}\Rightarrow sin\gamma=\frac{\sqrt3}{2}\therefore\gamma=60°</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-605" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-606"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;z&nbsp;অক্ষের সাথে উৎপন্ন কোণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="width: 1.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.07em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-609"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-611"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-612"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">60°</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-614" style="width: 11.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.674em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.59em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-615"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-616"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-618" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-619"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-620" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-621"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-627"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-635"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-636" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-637"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-638" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-639" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>γ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm \cos^2{\alpha}+\cos^2{\beta}+\cos^2{\gamma}=1</script></span></strong>&nbsp;;&nbsp;সূত্রের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-641" style="width: 8.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.97em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-642"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-643"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-644" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-645" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-646"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-647" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-648"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-651" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-652" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-655" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-661" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>γ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm \sin^2{\gamma}=\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{4}</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="width: 3.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.62em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-663"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-666" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-667"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-668"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\gamma=60°</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>[বি:দ্র: সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও গ্রহণযোগ্য হবে।]</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p>ধরি, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-829" style="width: 0.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1000.58em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-830"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-831"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-832"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-833"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm \vec{A}</script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.047em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.603em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>η</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">\rm \therefore\hat{\eta}=\frac{\vec{A}\times\vec{B}}{|\vec{A}\times\vec{B}|}=\frac{5\hat{i}-5\hat{j}-5\hat{k}}{\sqrt{5^2+5^2+5^2}}=\frac{5\hat{i}-5\hat{j}-5\hat{k}}{5\sqrt3}=\frac{\hat{i}}{\sqrt3}-\frac{\hat{j}}{\sqrt3}-\frac{\hat{k}}{\sqrt3}\ (Ans.)</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="width: 9.428em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>&amp;#x03B7;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="width: 8.281em;                                         </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>তড়িৎ ঋণাত্মকতা কী? ফ্লোরিনের ইলেকট্রন আসক্তি ক্লোরিনের চেয়ে কম কেন?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">সমযোজী বন্ধনে শেয়ারকৃত ইলেকট্রন যুগলকে কোনো মৌলের পরমাণুর নিজের দিকে আকর্ষণ করার তুলনামূলক ক্ষমতাই হচ্ছে তড়িৎ ঋণাত্মকতা।<br>
F এর যোজ্যতাস্তর ২য়। Cl&nbsp;এর তৃতীয়। F&nbsp;এর আকার Cl&nbsp;অপেক্ষা ছোট। ফলে F এর ২য় শক্তিস্তরে ক্ষুদ্র পরিসরে 7&nbsp;টি ইলেকট্রন থাকায় এতে ইলেকট্রন মেঘের ঘনত্ব অনেক বেশি ফলে নতুন ইলেকট্রনের প্রতি ২য় শক্তিস্তরের ইলেকট্রনসমূহের পারস্পরিক বিকর্ষণ বেশি হওয়ায় F&nbsp;এর ইলেকট্রন আসক্তি কম।<br>
অন্যদিকে ক্লোরিনের তৃতীয় শক্তিস্তর বড় হওয়ায় এতে 7&nbsp;টি ইলেকট্রন সহজে স্থান করে নেয়। ইলেকট্রন মেঘের ঘনত্ব কম হওয়ায় ইলেকট্রন-ইলেকট্রন বির্কষণ তুলনামূলক কম হয়। এতে আগমনকারী ইলেকট্রন সহজে যোজ্যতাস্তরে প্রবেশ করতে পারে। এ কারণে ফ্লোরিনের ইলেকট্রন আসক্তির মান ক্লোরিনের চেয়ে কম।<br>
<strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
তড়িৎ ঋণাত্মকতার সংজ্ঞা লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
নতুন ইলেকট্রনের প্রতি F এর যোজ্যতাস্তরের ইলেকট্রনসমূহের পারস্পরিক বিকর্ষণ Cl&nbsp;এর চেয়ে বেশি; বুঝিয়ে লেখার জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>(a)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="width: 2.684em; 			<p>(b)&nbsp;Sc d -ব্লক মৌল হলেও অবস্থান্তর মৌল নয় কেন? (১.৫)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>26</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>5</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1071" style="width: 16.559em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>S</mi><msup><mi>c</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><menclose notation=&quot;box&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>0</mn></msup></mrow></menclose></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="width: 16.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.609em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1013.61em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1118"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1119"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1125"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1127"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1128"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1137"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1138" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1139" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1143" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1144" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1146"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1147" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1148" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1151"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1153" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1155"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1156" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1157" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="menclose" id="MathJax-Span-1158"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px;"><span id="MathJax-frame-1158" style="border: 0.084em solid; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 1.887em; height: 1.273em; vertical-align: -0.08em; position: absolute; top: -1.105em; left: 0em;"></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1001.52em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1159"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1160"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1161"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1163"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1164" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1165" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>S</mi><msup><mi>c</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><menclose notation="box"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>0</mn></msup></mrow></menclose></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\left(b\right)\ Sc^{3+}\left(21\right)=1s^2\ 2s^22p^6\ 3s^23p^6\fbox{$3d^0$}</script></span></p>

<p>এখানে,&nbsp;&nbsp;Sc&nbsp;এর স্থিতিশীল আয়নে&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>S</mi><msup><mi>c</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1166" style="width: 3.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1003.2em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1167"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1168"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1169" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1170"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1171" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1172"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1173" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1174"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1175"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1176" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1177" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1178" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1180" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>S</mi><msup><mi>c</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\left(Sc^{3+}\right)\ d </script></span>&nbsp;অরবিটাল ফাঁকা থাকে। তাই&nbsp;Sc, d -ব্লক মৌল হলেও অবস্থান্তর মৌল নয়।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1181" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.8em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1182"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1183" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1184"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1185" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1186"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1187"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">Fe^{3+} </script></span>&nbsp;এর ইলেকট্রন বিন্যাস লিখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p>এখানে,&nbsp;&nbsp;Sc&nbsp;এর স্থিতিশীল আয়নে&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>S</mi><msup><mi>c</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="width: 3.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1003.2em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1191"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1192"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1194"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1195" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1196"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1198"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1199"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1202" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>S</mi><msup><mi>c</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\left(Sc^{3+}\right)\ d </script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;অরবিটাল ফাঁকা থাকে, এটি যেকোন ভাবে বুঝিয়ে লিখার জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td><strong>নিম্নোক্ত বিক্রিয়াগুলো সম্পন্ন কর :</strong></td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mover><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mpadded width=&quot;+0.611em&quot; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1400" style="width: 4.51em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1413" style="width: 7.502em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
প্রতিটি বিক্রিয়া সঠিকভাবে সম্পন্ন করার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>(i)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>B</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1476" style="width: 14.059em; <p>(iii)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>O</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>B</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="width: 12.666em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>O</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>B</mi><mi>e</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1563" style="width: 15.33em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1650" style="width: 3.65em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1651"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1654"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1657"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\therefore Cl_2O_7 </script></span>&nbsp;অম্লধর্মী।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p>বিক্রিয়াসহ প্রতিটি অক্সাইডের প্রকৃতি সঠিকভাবে নিরূপণ করার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (4)</h2>
                            </div>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9</span>

                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1678" style="width: 15.125em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="width: 15.904em; top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1730"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.047em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\rm 3x+4y=2\Rightarrow\frac{x}{\frac{2}{3}}+\frac{y}{\frac{1}{2}}=1\cdots\cdots\left(ii\right)</script></span></p>

<p>তাহলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="width: 10.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1008.12em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1735"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1757" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1758" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 120px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1759" style="width: 0.658em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1793" style="width: 12.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.494em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1010.41em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1794"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1803" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1809" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1810" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm \Rightarrow6y-3=-x\therefore x+6y=3;</script></span>&nbsp;যা নির্ণেয় সমীকরণ।</p>

<p>AB&nbsp;এর দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1811" style="width: 10.453em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1845" style="width: 3.404em; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\rm A\left(3,\ 0\right)</script></span></strong>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1868" style="width: 4.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.73em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1869"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">\rm x+6y=3</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p>AB&nbsp;এর দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>37</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1876" style="width: 2.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1002.26em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1877"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1879" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1001.31em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1880"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1881"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1882" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">37</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.7em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>[বি:দ্র: একক না লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]&nbsp;</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.732em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.048em;
