<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1961" style="width: 18.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.92em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1014.88em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1962"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1967"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">15</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1977"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1986"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm \Rightarrow1\left(-12-15\right)-a\left(2-5\right)+4\left(3+6\right)=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="width: 10.207em; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2002" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="width: 0.658em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2020" style="width: 0.658em; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণেয় রেখা:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2023" style="width: 15.412em; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2038" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2042" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3.1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm x-3y=-2-3.1\therefore x-3y+5=0</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2043" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.54em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2044"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2048" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\rm a=-3</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2049" style="width: 6.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.12em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2050"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\rm x-3y+5=0</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয় করার জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>ঘড়ির কাঁটার প্রস্থকে নগণ্য বিবেচনা করে দুপুর দুইটার সময় ঘন্টার কাঁটার সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 106px;"></p>

<p>12 ঘন্টায় উৎপন্ন কোণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2059" style="width: 2.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.13em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2060"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2063"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2064" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2065" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">\rm =2\pi^c</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2066" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2067"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2068" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;1&nbsp;ঘন্টায় উৎপন্ন কোণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msup><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2069" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.8em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2070"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2072" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2073"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2074" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2075" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2076" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msup><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm =\frac{\pi^c}{6}</script></span></p>

<p>চিত্রানুযায়ী O&nbsp;কে মূলবিন্দু বিবেচনা করে, নির্ণেয় সমীকরণ:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2077" style="width: 5.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.84em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2078"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2080" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2081" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2082"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2083" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2084"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2085"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2086" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2087"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2088" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2089" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2090" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2091" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">x</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-97">\rm y=\tan{\left(\frac{\pi}{6}\right)x}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2092" style="width: 11.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1009.55em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2093"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2096" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2097" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2098" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2099"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2100"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2101" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2103" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2106" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2107"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\rm \Rightarrow y=\frac{1}{\sqrt3}x\therefore x-\sqrt3y=0</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
1 ঘন্টায় উৎপন্ন কোণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></msup><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2112" style="width: 2.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1001.89em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2113"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2115" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2116"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2117" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2118" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2119" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msup><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">\rm =\frac{\pi^C}{6}</script></span>; নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="width: 5.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.674em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.67em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2121"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2125"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2127"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2128"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2129" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2130"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2131" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2133" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\rm y=\tan{\left(\frac{\pi}{6}\right)}x</script></span>; নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2135" style="width: 5.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.43em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2136"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2139" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2140"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\rm x-\sqrt3y=0</script></span>; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2145" style="width: 5.591em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.585em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.55em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2146"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">\rm x+2y=3</script></span> রেখার সাপেক্ষে (1, 2) বিন্দুর প্রতিবিম্ব নির্ণয় কর।</td>

                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>AB রেখা:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2153" style="width: 8.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1007.09em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2154"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2160" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2164" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">\rm x+2y=3\ \cdots\cdots\left(i\right)</script></span></p>

<p>AB রেখার উপর লম্ব ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2168" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2169"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2170"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2172"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2175" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\left(1,\ 2\right)</script></span> বিন্দুগামী&nbsp;</p>

<p>GO রেখা:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2178" style="width: 17.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1014.22em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2179"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2181" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2197" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2199"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\rm 2x-y=2.1-2\Rightarrow2x-y=0\cdots\cdots\left(ii\right)</script></span></p>

<p>(i)&nbsp;ও (ii) সমাধান করে পাই, O&nbsp;বিন্দু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2203" style="width: 3.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1003.03em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2204"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2206" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2207" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2208"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2209"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2210" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2211" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2213" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; <p>এখন, O&nbsp;বিন্দুটি GH&nbsp;এর মধ্যবিন্দু।</p>

<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 200px; height: 158px;"></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>:</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2270" style="width: 7.297em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>:</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm GO: 2x-y=0;</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2282" style="width: 3.814em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2293" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2294" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2295" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\rm O\left(\frac{3}{5},\frac{6}{5}\right)</script></span>; নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-110-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2296" style="width: 6.928em; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2304" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2307" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2308" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2309"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2310"><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2312" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2314" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2315" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2316" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2317" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-110">\rm \left(\alpha,\ \beta\right)\equiv\left(\frac{1}{5},\frac{2}{5}\right)</script></span>; নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Biology (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>হৃৎপিণ্ডের প্রাচীর কতটি স্তরে গঠিত? হৃৎপিণ্ডের বাম নিলয়ের প্রাচীর ডান নিলয়ের প্রাচীর অপেক্ষা পুরু কেন?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">হৃৎপিণ্ডের প্রাচীর ৩টি স্তরে গঠিত।<br>
<strong>বাম নিলয়ের প্রাচীর ডান নিলয়ের প্রাচীর অপেক্ষা পুরু। কারণ-</strong><br>
হৃৎপিণ্ডের ডান নিলয় থেকে রক্ত ফুসফুসে প্রেরিত হয়। এটি হৃৎপিণ্ডের খুব নিকটে অবস্থিত বলে খুব কম শক্তি প্রয়োগ করে রক্ত পাঠানো যায়। অন্যদিকে হৃৎপিণ্ডের বাম নিলয় থেকে সমগ্র দেহে রক্ত প্রেরিত হয় যাতে অনেক বেশি শক্তি প্রয়োগ করতে হয়। ফলে সম পরিমাণ রক্ত প্রেরণ করলেও ডান নিলয় থেকে বাম নিলয়ের বেশি কাজ করতে হয়। এ কর্মদক্ষতার তারতম্যের কারণে বাম নিলয়ের প্রাচীরের অঙ্গসংস্থানিক পরিবর্তন ঘটে অর্থাৎ বাম নিলয়ের প্রাচীর ডান নিলয়ের প্রাচীর অপেক্ষা অধিক পুরু হয়।<br>
<strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
হৃৎপিণ্ডের প্রাচীর ৩টি স্তরে গঠিত লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
‘হৃৎপিণ্ডের বাম নিলয়ের প্রাচীর ডান নিলয়ের প্রাচীর অপেক্ষা পুরু’ এর কারণ বুঝিয়ে লিখলে ০২ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>অ্যানজাইনা কাকে বলে? উচ্চ রক্তচাপজনিত হৃদযন্ত্রের ৩টি রোগ উল্লেখ কর।</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>অ্যানজাইনা:</strong><br>
হৃদপেশি যখন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2318" style="width: 1.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.99em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2319"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2320"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2322" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-111">\rm O_2</script></span> সমৃদ্ধ পর্যাপ্ত রক্ত সরবরাহ পায় না তখন বুক নিষ্পেষিত হচ্ছে বা দম বন্ধ হয়ে আসছে এমন মারাত্মক অস্বস্তি অনুভূত হলে সে ধরনের বুক ব্যথাকে অ্যানজাইনা বা অ্যানজাইনা পেকটোরিস বলে। অ্যানজাইনাকে সাধারণত হার্ট অ্যাটাকের পূর্বাবস্থা মনে করা হয়।<br>
<strong>হৃদযন্ত্রের জটিলতা:</strong><br>
উচ্চ রক্তচাপের কারণে হৃৎপিণ্ডে যেসব জটিলতার সৃষ্টি হয়, তাদের নাম করোনারি হার্ট ডিজিজ বা ইস্কেমিক হার্ট ডিজিজ (ischaemic heart disease)। তিনটি রোগ এর আওতাভুক্ত। যথা :<br>
(i) এনজাইনা পেকটোরিস (angina pectoris)&nbsp;<br>
(ii) মায়োকার্ডিয়াল ইনফার্কশন (myocardial infarction)&nbsp;<br>
(iii) হার্ট ফেইলিউর (Heart failure)<br>
<strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
অ্যানজাইনার সংজ্ঞা লিখলে ০১ নম্বর।<br>
৩টি রোগ এর নাম লিখলে (০.৫ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-112-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2323" style="width: 0.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2324"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.703em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>×</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-112">\times</script></span>&nbsp;৩) = ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>মানবদেহে কত ধরনের রক্তসংবহন সংঘটিত হয়? হেপাটিক পোর্টাল এবং করোনারি সংবহনের ধারারেখ উল্লেখ কর।</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>মাবনদেহে চার প্রক্রিয়ায় রক্তসংবহন সংঘটিত হয়, যথা-১. সিস্টেমিক, ২. পালমোনারি, ৩. পোর্টাল এবং ৪. করোনারি।<br>
<strong>হেপাটিক পোর্টাল সংবহনঃ</strong><br>
পৌষ্টিক অঙ্গসমূহ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2326" style="width: 1.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.78em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2327"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-113">→</script></span> হেপাটিক পোর্টাল শিরা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2329" style="width: 1.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.78em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2330"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">→</script></span> যকৃত <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2339"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">→</script></span> হৃৎপিণ্ড<br>
<strong>করোনারি সংবহনঃ</strong><br>
হৃদপেশিতে রক্ত সঞ্চালনকারি সংবহনকে করোনারি রক্ত সংবহন বলে।<br>
সিস্টেমিক ধমনি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2341" style="width: 1.027em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2342"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">→</script></span> করোনারি ধমনি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2344" style="width: 1.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.78em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2345"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2347" style="width: 1.027em;
